title: [Champion Concept] Mira - the puppeteer (Support)

embed.description: Mira (Support) - the Puppeteer Champion Concept "Come closer" Stack puppet strings onto enemy champions and make them your toys. Mira is a utility focused support who, with appropriate setup, prepares a safety net for making risky plays, but also maintains a passive threat in team fig

body:
Hey guys, I posted a champion concept to the NA boards [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/GILteZFW-champion-concept-mira-the-puppeteer-support).

Check it out and give me feedback!

And upvote! It'd be awesome if eventually a Rito person saw it
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
